name: The Muse (Jellyfishthecoolkid)
description:
A girl has to stay overnight in the school library, and during that meantime, she accidentally dived into the world of Vietnamese poetry.

Headphones recommended. 

----------------
CONTROLS
----------------
Left Mouse 
----Interact----

Enter 
----Continue Dialogue----
